00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");
00035 
00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'scrub') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['editsave']);
00041     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'scrub';
00042 }
00043 
00044 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045     unset ($_SESSION['editsave']);
00046     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save'])) {
00050     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber];
00051 }
00052 
00053 if (isset($_GET['dropinterface'])) {
00054     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->delEntity ("interface", $rulenumber, $_GET['dropinterface']);
00055     reload();
00056 }
00057 
00058 if (isset($_GET['dropto'])) {
00059     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->delEntity ("to", $rulenumber, $_GET['dropto']);
00060     reload();
00061 }
00062 
00063 if (isset($_GET['dropfrom'])) {
00064     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->delEntity ("from", $rulenumber, $_GET['dropfrom']);
00065     reload();
00066 }
00067 
00068 if (isset($_POST['addfrom']) && !strpos($_POST['addfrom'], "macro")) {
00069     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->addEntity("from", $rulenumber, $_POST['addfrom']);
00070     reload();
00071 }
00072 
00073 if (isset($_POST['addto']) && !strpos($_POST['addto'], "macro")) {
00074     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->addEntity("to", $rulenumber, $_POST['addto']);
00075     reload();
00076 }
00077 
00078 if (isset($_POST['addinterface']) && !strpos($_POST['addinterface'], "macro")) {
00079     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->addEntity("interface", $rulenumber, $_POST['addinterface']);
00080     reload();
00081 }
00082 
00083 if (count($_POST)) {
00084     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['direction'] =  $_POST['direction'];
00085     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['no-df'] =      ($_POST['no-df'] ? true : false);
00086     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['random-id'] =  ($_POST['random-id'] ? true : false);
00087     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['min-ttl'] =    $_POST['min-ttl'];
00088     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['max-mss'] =        $_POST['max-mss'];
00089     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['set-tos'] =    $_POST['set-tos'];
00090     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['reassemble'] = $_POST['reassemble'];
00091     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['all'] =            ($_POST['all'] ? true : false);
00092     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] =        $_POST['comment'];
00093 
00094     if ($_POST['all']) {
00095         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['from']);
00096         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['to']);
00097     }
00098 
00099     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber];
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*
00103 * go back
00104 */
00105 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00106 
00107     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00108     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00109     if (!(isset($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['all']) || isset($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules[$rulenumber]['from']))) {
00110         $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->del ($rulenumber);
00111     }
00112     header ("Location: scrub.php");
00113 }
00114 
00115 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00116     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00117     header ("Location: scrub.php");
00118 }
00119
